title: Client crashing
body: My client has always worked fine for at least a year now up to 6.16 patch notes, now my client has crashed twice today in the 2 games games I have tried to play. The first game it crashed then turned off league for a few hours then retarted my computer made sure everything was working fine and crashed again. They were both ranked games now as a result I lost 50lp due to this and its very frustrating. This may seem like whining, but lets be honest you would be upset and frustrated if this happened to you. Is this a bug with the new patch and if so can riot please restore my unfairly lost lp?

replies.body:
Can you give me more details as to what errors or behavior you saw when the crashes occur? This will give me an idea of what steps can be taken to fix this.

Additionally, we cannot restore LP, as once the LP has been recorded by the server, we cannot modify it in any way. This is designed to prevent abuse of the system.
After the champion selection it will start at the loading screen and then after maybe 30 sec-min just flat out crash.

Thanks for providing that information. So crashing out of the loading screen is typically caused by the client not being able to establish a stable connection to the game server. As a first step in troubleshooting, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) 

Let me know if you notice any changes after working through it.
Seems to be a very common problem at the moment.
